Co-Location Services

Request Quote

Web Werks 1U, 2U & 12U Server Colo in India

Many organizations start at a small level and gradually turn big. As companies transform, their IT requirement changes as well. Other infrastructure service providers might persuade you in buying a whole lot of rack space, we give you what your business specifically require. If your organization is in need of space for couple of servers, Web Werks rent you the area. We provide your single server colocation space within our Tier IV datacenters at prices that fit your budget. We free you from the crunch of building and maintaining your own IT facility that includes the overhead expenses linked with managing the Infrastructure and the resources required for its maintenance.

Single Server colocation services ranges from 1U upto 12U usable space. This service is ideal for single server hardware or upto Â¼ of a 42U Rack cabinet depending upon the size of your server hardware. If you have a business running on your server of size (1U) or multiple server clusters upto 12U, our single server DC colocation is the best option for you.

Key Benefits

Customizable

Customize your needs from 1U on up of usable space. We offer 1U to 12U usable space.

Uninterrupted Power Supply

We assure to maintain your online presence by delivering high-availability power resources.

Hosted in Tier III and Tier IV DC Facilities

Hardware are engulfed within an highly secured and reliable infrastructure.

24x7 Rapid Action Support

Round-the-clock support from our highly skilled team of expertise.

Webwerks Colocation let you customize your colo needs from 1U on up of usable space, securely locked in a world-class data center at 5 locations and incredible support to meet your IT needs. Our Single Colo solutions are perfect for the client that has less than a full rack worth of equipment as it helps in avoiding over-investing in cabinet space while providing access to a facility that provides the highest level of security, reliability and availability.
